product_name: Nantucket Bike Basket Company Cruiser D-Shape Bike Basket
long_description: The Nantucket Cruiser D-Shape bike basket is designed with the classic cruiser bicycle in mind, offering timeless appeal and everyday functionality. Basket attaches to handlbar with leather straps. Made from strong and durable rattan. The Nantucket Cruiser D-Shape bike basket has a weight limit of 13 lbs.
short_description: The Nantucket Cruiser D-Shape bike basket is designed with the classic cruiser bicycle in mind, offering timeless appeal and everyday functionality.
